duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect and analyze historical data, identify trends, and develop detailed market-based healthcare utilization projections.
Create clear visual representations of data findings using Excel graphics, Tableau, PowerPoint, mapping software, and other tools.
Assess the impact of strategic alternatives and generate analyses and conclusions for strategic, business, and provider plans.
Develop recommendations to improve clients’ strategic position and assess the impact of strategic alternatives.
Translate industry and market research into relevant observations and recommendations.
Maintain project schedules and consistently meet deliverable deadlines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Healthcare Administration, Data Analytics, or related field required; Master’s degree preferred.
